Subject: Urgent Payment Needed for Overdue Invoice - Action Required

Dear valued customer,

We hope this email finds you well. We are reaching out to you regarding an outstanding invoice that is now past due. As a vendor, we rely on prompt payments to maintain the quality of service we provide to our clients.

Our records indicate that Invoice #123456, dated 07/15/2021, is now 30 days overdue. We kindly request your immediate attention to this matter and ask that you settle the outstanding balance as soon as possible.

Please be advised that failure to make payment promptly may result in late fees being applied to your account. To avoid any further complications, we urge you to make the payment at your earliest convenience.

For your convenience, we have included a secure link below for you to make the payment online. Simply click on the link and follow the instructions to complete the transaction.

[Secure Payment Link]

If you have already made the payment, please disregard this email. Otherwise, we kindly ask for your prompt action to avoid any disruptions to our services.

Thank you for your cooperation and understanding. We look forward to resolving this matter swiftly and continuing our partnership on a positive note.

Warm regards,

[Vendor Name]
Accounts Receivable Team
